languages.text: "Эхо былого преступления прозвучало под сводами нашего дома". {n}Дикарь сумрачно кивает вам.{/n} "Призрак из небытия, подобный вам, но лишенный лица, шествовал между нами. Из уст его звучали слова, которым не должно было быть, а затем он проник в чертоги Обсервуса. И обитель наша сотрясалась от гнева богов много дней, и казалось, что мы плывем в небытии".

"The echo of an old crime was heard beneath the arching vaults of our home." {n}The tribesman nods at you gloomily.{/n} "A ghost of nothingness walked among us, of like appearance to you but without a face. He spoke words that must not be spoken, and then penetrated the Chamber of Observus. And our abode was shaken by the wrath of the gods for days, and we felt as though we were drifting through nothingness."
languages.original_text: "Эхо былого преступления прозвучало под сводами нашего дома". {n}Дикарь сумрачно кивает вам.{/n} "Призрак из небытия, подобный вам, но лишенный лица, шествовал между нами. Из уст его звучали слова, которым не должно было быть, а затем он проник в чертоги Обсервуса. И обитель наша сотрясалась от гнева богов много дней, и казалось, что мы плывем в небытии".

languages.text: 「昔の罪の残響は、我が家のアーチ型の部屋の下でも聞こえてきた」{n}部族の男はあなたに向かって憂うつそうにうなずく。{/n}「無の亡霊が私たちに交じり歩んでいた。顔のないあなたのような姿でに。話してはならない言葉を話し、観察室に入っていった。そして、私たちの住処は神々の怒りで何日にもわたって揺れた。無の中を彷徨うような心地だった」
languages.original_text: "The echo of an old crime was heard beneath the arching vaults of our home." {n}The tribesman nods at you gloomily.{/n} "A ghost of nothingness walked among us, of like appearance to you but without a face. He spoke words that must not be spoken, and then penetrated the Chamber of Observus. And our abode was shaken by the wrath of the gods for days, and we felt as though we were drifting through nothingness."

traits.locale_text: 「昔の罪の残響は、我が家のアーチ型の部屋の下でも聞こえてきた」{n}部族の男はあなたに向かって憂うつそうにうなずく。{/n}「無の亡霊が私たちに交じり歩んでいた。顔のないあなたのような姿でに。話してはならない言葉を話し、観察室に入っていった。そして、私たちの住処は神々の怒りで何日にもわたって揺れた。無の中を彷徨うような心地だった」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “古老罪行的回声回荡在我们住所的拱形穹顶下。”{n}这位部落民沮丧地向你点点头。{/n}“有个虚无的鬼魂在我们间走来走去，和你的外表很像，但没有脸。他说了不该说的话，还钻进了远眺之间。在那之后，神明变得愤怒不已，我们的住处也震动了很多天。我们觉得自己就好像在虚无中漂流一样。”
languages.original_text: "The echo of an old crime was heard beneath the arching vaults of our home." {n}The tribesman nods at you gloomily.{/n} "A ghost of nothingness walked among us, of like appearance to you but without a face. He spoke words that must not be spoken, and then penetrated the Chamber of Observus. And our abode was shaken by the wrath of the gods for days, and we felt as though we were drifting through nothingness."

traits.locale_text: “古老罪行的回升回荡在我们住所的拱形穹顶下。”{n}这位部落民沮丧地向你点点头。{/n}“有个虚无的鬼魂在我们间走来走去，和你的外表很像，但没有脸。他说了不该说的话，还钻进了远眺之间。在那之后，神明变得愤怒不已，我们的住处也震动了很多天。我们觉得自己就好像在虚无中漂流一样。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Les voûtes de notre foyer ont résonné de l'écho d'un crime passé, {n}répond-il avec un hochement de tête sombre.{/n} Un fantôme du néant, semblable à vous en apparence, mais dépourvu de visage, a marché parmi nous. Il a dit des mots qui ne doivent pas être prononcés avant de pénétrer dans la chambre d'Observus. Notre demeure a tremblé sous la colère des dieux pendant des jours, et nous avons craint de rejoindre le néant. »
languages.original_text: "The echo of an old crime was heard beneath the arching vaults of our home." {n}The tribesman nods at you gloomily.{/n} "A ghost of nothingness walked among us, of like appearance to you but without a face. He spoke words that must not be spoken, and then penetrated the Chamber of Observus. And our abode was shaken by the wrath of the gods for days, and we felt as though we were drifting through nothingness."

traits.locale_text: « Les voûtes de notre foyer ont résonné de l'écho d'un crime passé, {n}répond-il avec un hochement de tête sombre.{/n} Un fantôme du néant, semblable à vous en apparence, mais dépourvu de visage, a marché parmi nous. Il a dit des mots qui ne doivent pas être prononcés avant de pénétrer dans la chambre d'Observus. Notre demeure a tremblé sous la colère des dieux pendant des jours, et nous avons craint de rejoindre le néant. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Bajo las bóvedas arqueadas de nuestro hogar, resonó el eco de un antiguo crimen». {n}El miembro de la tribu te mira con tristeza.{/n} «Había un fantasma de la nada entre nosotros, parecido a ti, pero sin cara. Pronunciaba palabras que no debían ser dichas, y luego accedió a la Cámara de Observus. Durante días, nuestra morada sufrió la ira de los dioses, y sentimos como si estuviéramos a la deriva en la nada».
languages.original_text: "The echo of an old crime was heard beneath the arching vaults of our home." {n}The tribesman nods at you gloomily.{/n} "A ghost of nothingness walked among us, of like appearance to you but without a face. He spoke words that must not be spoken, and then penetrated the Chamber of Observus. And our abode was shaken by the wrath of the gods for days, and we felt as though we were drifting through nothingness."

traits.locale_text: «Bajo las bóvedas arqueadas de nuestro hogar, resonó el eco de un antiguo crimen». {n}El miembro de la tribu te mira con tristeza.{/n} «Había un fantasma de la nada entre nosotros, parecido a ti, pero sin cara. Pronunciaba palabras que no debían ser dichas, y luego accedió a la Cámara de Observus. Durante días, nuestra morada sufrió la ira de los dioses, y sentimos como si estuviéramos a la deriva en la nada».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Das Echo eines alten Verbrechens war unter den Gewölben unseres Zuhauses zu vernehmen." {n}Der Stammesmann nickt dir düster zu.{/n} "Ein Geist des Nichts wandelte unter uns. Er sah Euch ähnlich, nur ohne Gesicht. Er sprach Worte, die nicht gesprochen werden dürfen, und dann drang er in die Kammer des Observus ein. Und unser Reich erzitterte tagelang durch den Zorn der Götter; und wir hatten das Gefühl, durch das Nichts zu schweben."
languages.original_text: "The echo of an old crime was heard beneath the arching vaults of our home." {n}The tribesman nods at you gloomily.{/n} "A ghost of nothingness walked among us, of like appearance to you but without a face. He spoke words that must not be spoken, and then penetrated the Chamber of Observus. And our abode was shaken by the wrath of the gods for days, and we felt as though we were drifting through nothingness."

traits.locale_text: "Das Echo eines alten Verbrechens war unter den Gewölben unseres Zuhauses zu vernehmen." {n}Der Stammesmann nickt dir düster zu.{/n} "Ein Geist des Nichts wandelte unter uns. Er sah Euch ähnlich, nur ohne Gesicht. Er sprach Worte, die nicht gesprochen werden dürfen, und dann drang er in die Kammer des Observus ein. Und unser Reich erzitterte tagelang durch den Zorn der Götter; und wir hatten das Gefühl, durch das Nichts zu schweben."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Evimizin kemerli mahzenlerinin altında eski bir suçun yankıları duyuldu." {n}Kabile halkı, hüzünle başlarını eğiyor.{/n} "Hiçlikten gelen bir hayalet, aramızda yürüdü. Görünüşü seni andırıyordu ama yüzü yoktu. Telaffuz edilmemesi gereken sözcükler söyleyip Observatuvar'a zorla girdi. Meskenimiz günlerce tanrıların öfkesiyle sarsıldı, hiçlikte sürüklendiğimizi hissettik."
languages.original_text: "The echo of an old crime was heard beneath the arching vaults of our home." {n}The tribesman nods at you gloomily.{/n} "A ghost of nothingness walked among us, of like appearance to you but without a face. He spoke words that must not be spoken, and then penetrated the Chamber of Observus. And our abode was shaken by the wrath of the gods for days, and we felt as though we were drifting through nothingness."

traits.locale_text: "Evimizin kemerlenen mahzenlerinin altında, eski bir suça dair yankılar duyuldu." {n}Kabile halkı hüzünlü bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Hiçlikten gelen bir hayalet aramızda yürüdü. Görünüşü seni andırıyordu ama bir yüzü yoktu. Konuşulmaması gereken sözcükler söyledi ve Observus Odası'na zorla girdi. Meskenimiz günlerce tanrıların öfkesiyle sarsıldı ve hiçlikte sürüklendiğimizi hissettik."
traits.speaker: Chief
